name: Courtyard by Marriott Tampa Oldsmar

reviews.text: The hotel was very clean- lots to do. There are about four restaurants right in front of it (walk to) and the best is City Fish- the best Sea Bass I have ever had!!!
reviews.title: Great hotel- staff needs improvement

reviews.text: The hotel is nice, decorated nicely and clean. The front desk however, is non existant. I have never walked up and had someone there. I always have to ring the bell. We stayed here two nights while looking for a home. I called the front desk twice and no one anwswered. The store in the lobby was out of a lot incoluding wine. We forgot our toothpaste, and they had none for us. Breakfast was good. We paid $109 first night and $129 the second.
reviews.title: New, friendly, in newer area in Tampa

reviews.text: Long story short- great room, great location for business or Westchase area, but lobby service needs a little help!
reviews.title: Courtyard Marriot - but better!
Chic hotel, fabulous service, great rates
reviews.text: Stayed for two nights. Oldsmar, from what I could tell, is a newer area (near Westchase) with new stores opening, but not much around the general hotel area besides the race track and flea market.

aka: Courtyard By Marriott Tampa Oldsmar Hotel
